imports: import type { XmlFormattingOptions } from "@s4tk/xml-dom"; // TypeScript only

header.description: Options to use when writing a node as an XML string.

content.name: indents
content.description: Number of times to indent this node. This will increase by 1 for each recursive call. (Default = 0)

content.name: spacesPerIndent
content.description: Number of spaces to use per indent. (Default = 2)

content.name: writeProcessingInstructions
content.description: Whether or not to include any XML processing instructions other than the XML declaration at the top of the file. (Default = true)

content.name: writeXmlDeclaration
content.description: Whether or not to include the XML declaration at the top of the file. Only applicable to document nodes. (Default = true)
